reviewText: I had never seen chorus line all the way through and did enjoy it. I also already have "De lovely" which I bought from you and this is the second copy of Hair that I have bought and it works. Hallelujah! The other just wouldn't play and was a cassette and also I bought s"Songs for the Ne Depression" by Bette Midler and it as well will not play. I've been told it would work on a European cassette player.
